PerfectNetExp.abs: zaio 扎约, zairean 扎伊尔人, zaire 碳黑

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Zaire
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Zaire or its people;

auth_sentence.content: By then, the Zairean sound was in full flower, Camerounian makossa was coming on strong, and reggae had entered the mix.
auth_sentence.res_content: By then, the Zairean sound was in full flower, Camerounian makossa was coming on strong, and reggae had entered the mix.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By then, the Zairean sound was in full flower, Camerounian makossa was coming on strong, and reggae had entered the mix.

auth_sentence.content: They included some of those responsible for the massacres, and some joined Zairean forces to attack local Tutsis.
auth_sentence.res_content: They included some of those responsible for the massacres, and some joined Zairean forces to attack local Tutsis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They included some of those responsible for the massacres, and some joined Zairean forces to attack local Tutsis.
